name: Battle Bridge
description:
Welcome to my prototype build for battle bridge, The current build v1 is a core game play setup where by all the intended mechanic are working and then slowly adding more content/game mechanic as time progresses.

The vision for battle bridge is to have a perspective of a fleet commander in the bridge, witnessing the fleet battle. your task includes managing which target to prioritise and also keeping your fleet in shape for the battles.
